messages.subject: Help!!....sick
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/17/03 1:10:42 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:  I
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/17/03 1:10:42 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Does anyone have any miracle remedies for me? >>

I take massive doses of Garlic and an echinacea supplement that has Reisi
mushroom and Astragulus with it. Take triple what the bottle says on the
first day, then double for a few days.
I'm usually better within a day or two.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
